text: māgē paramādhipatiyāṇeni, oba maṭa rājyaya pirinæmuvehiya. tavada siduvīm vala yathārthaya igænvūvehiya. ahas hā poḷovē nirmāpakayāṇeni, melova hā matu lovehi māgē bhārakaru obaya. mā (obaṭa) avanata vanneku lesin maraṇayaṭa pat karanu mænava tavada dæhæmiyan samaga mā ek karanu mænava ( yanuven ohu prārthanā kaḷēya)
